com.silvergobletgames.sylver.audio

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.audio.Sound

  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    The sound class represents a sound that will be played in the game. This class contains all of the information about the sound that is needed.

      • ambientSound

        public static Sound ambientSound(java.lang.String ref,
                 boolean priority)
        Constructs an ambient sound
        Parameters:
        ref - path of the sound that is relative to the path registered in GameConfiguration
        priority - if this sound has priority
